RandomFacade - Class in facade
 
RandomMenuController - Class in controller
This class is the controller of the RandomMenu view This view displays 3 recipes randomly (starter, main course, dessert) and allows the user to change them as he pleases.

rateARecipe(int, int, double) - Method in class abstractDAO.AbstractRecipeDAO
add the rate of the user on the recipe given in param.

add a rate between the user in session and the recipe given in param.
rateARecipe(int, int, double) - Method in class mySQLDAO.MySQLRecipeDAO
add the rate of the user on the recipe given in param.

RecipeWithButton - Class in controller
This class was built to be able to have a button next to each recipe when we print all the recipes in a TableView

redirectToMyAccount(Event) - Method in class controller.CommonThemeController

Method called when clicking on a tab of the menu Call switchToNewPage with the right path of the new Page depending on the tab clicked

registerWithEnterKey(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.RegisterPageController
Method called when pressing a key (from keyboard) in the second password field Check if the key pressed is "Enter" Register if yes, otherwise do nothing
